content.text: Great news for industry players! THEI is back with the ULTRA Promo (Extra Profit) specially designed to provide maximum benefits for your business. Through this promo, we offer more affordable heavy equipment solutions without compromising the quality and reliability that have become our hallmark.
The Best Rental and Used Unit Offers

In the ULTRA Promo, you can get heavy equipment rental offers starting from IDR 25 Million per month. This is a golden opportunity for those who need additional units for short-term projects without making a large investment. Additionally, we also provide quality inspected used units with prices starting from IDR 700 Million. All our used units are guaranteed to be in prime and ready-to-work condition.

content.alt: Details of the ULTRA Promo offer with various heavy equipment

content.text: Furthermore, every transaction during the ULTRA Promo period will get a chance to win exclusive merchandise from Caterpillar and THEI. Don't miss this opportunity to strengthen your fleet while gaining extra profits. Contact our sales team now for more information.
